name: 2-[(E)-2-(4-Hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol
Reason: 2-[(E)-2-(4-Hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol has a melting point that can be predicted by considering its structural components. The basic unit for comparison is 2-methoxyphenol, which has a melting point of around 20 degrees Celsius. The additional functional groups and structural features in 2-[(E)-2-(4-hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol will affect its melting point: (1) The methoxy group (Oc1c(cc(cc1OC)C)C) adds rigidity and molecular weight, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius; (2) The hydroxyl group (C=Cc2ccc(O)c(OC)c2) introduces additional hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +10 degrees Celsius; (3) The vinyl group (C=Cc2ccc(O)c(OC)c2) adds a rigid structure and molecular weight, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius.
